title: I put a $50 CPU in a $2000 GAMING PC
description: You SHOULDN'T put the AMD Athlon 3000G alongside an RTX 2080Ti...or should you?  Never buy THIS Mystery Tech   How next gen Ryzen will change the game    Linus' video on the Athlon 3000G   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
